name: Blue for life-Collect garbage
description:
Project to protect our sea

Please find 50 pieces of garbage.

There are various kinds of garbage that can be unsuitable for the sea.
First of all, you need to find 50 pieces of garbage in this game world.
Your feeling you get while playing this game will enrich your real life.
It’s important to play with conviction that you really want to clean the sea.

The content of the game
In each picture of the beautiful sea, you can find one piece of garbage.
Find the garbage, just like “Photo hunt”.
It’s easy to play. You just need to tap a spot on a screen where you think the garbage is hiding and then press the “Confirm” button.

Let’s collect a lot of garbage and make our sea beautiful again!

Let's start with a worthwhile step!

When you finish picking up 50 pieces of garbage,
a new stage will begin, where you can learn something new about the sea.
Enjoy!

Let’s make the sea environment beautiful in order to keep coral and fish healthy.
